snippet: SHAPIRO--Daniel. The Funeral Service will be this Sunday, April 24, at 4:00pm at Central Synagogue in New York (streaming will be available on their website). The family will sit Shiva at the Synagogue following the Funeral and may be contacted for additional Shiva information. 1/3
lead_paragraph: SHAPIRO--Daniel. The Funeral Service will be this Sunday, April 24, at 4:00pm at Central Synagogue in New York (streaming will be available on their website). The family will sit Shiva at the Synagogue following the Funeral and may be contacted for additional Shiva information. 1/3
